node.title: Blackcaps v Bangladesh: 1st test, 4th day - Live
node.description: All the action from Bay Oval in Mt Maunganui.
node.content: ["App users please click here for latest score", "Kia ora, good morning and welcome to Newshub's live coverage of the opening Blackcaps v Bangladesh at Mt Maunganui's Bay Oval.", "After\u00a0Devon Conway's century set the tone for New Zealand\u00a0on the opening day,\u00a0the tourists fought back valiantly on Sunday, wrapping up the home team's lower order cheaply and laying a strong foundation to challenge a 328-run target.", "That fight-back continued on Monday, with the Tigers batsman frustrating and denying New Zealand for long periods and are now a good session of batting away from ending the homeside's hopes of victory.\u00a0", "Bangladesh resume Tuesday on 401/6 - 73 runs ahead of New Zealand on a flat wicket that is showing signs of taking turn in the final two days.", "The Blackcaps need four wickets in the morning session to have any chance of building enough of a lead to force victory late on the final day.", "Play resumes at 11am.", "NZ 328 (Conway 122, Nicholls 75, Young 52, Shoriful 3/69, Mehidy 3/86)\nBangladesh 401/6 (Mominul 88, Das 86, Joy 78, Boult 3/61)\u00a0", "New Zealand: Tom Latham (c), Will Young, Devon Conway, Ross Taylor, Henry Nicholls, Tom Blundell (wicketkeeper), Rachin Ravindra, Kyle Jamieson, Tim Southee, Neil Wagner, Trent Boult", "Bangladesh: Shadman Islam, Mahmudul Hasan Joy, Najmul Hossain Shanto, Mominul Haque (c), Mushfiqur Rahim, Liton Das (wicketkeeper), Yasir Ali, Mehidy Hasan Miraz, Taskin Ahmed, Ebadot Hossain, Shoriful Islam\u00a0", "TAB odds: Bangladesh $4.01, New Zealand $6.27, Draw $1.36\u00a0"]
